page.title: 18SCHOOL GROUNDS.
page.content: IN THE SCHOOL GROUNDS WE HAVE A LOT OF TREES. WE HAVE 8CYPRESS 3 DAMSOM TREES 4 ASH THREES 1 CHERRY TREE 1 WEEPING WILLOW 1SERVICE TREE 2 SYCAMORE 3 CRAB APPLE 3ROWAN TREES AND 1YEW TREE WE HAVE FLOWERS TOO AND ON THE TOP GRASS WE GROW OUR OWN THINGS.THE WEEPING CHERRY IS IN MEMORY OF TWO SCHOOL TEACHERS WHO DIED WHILE CYCLING THROUGH THIS VILLAGE ON THE 26TH APRIL 1973. THIS TREE LOOKS BEST IN SPRING IT HAS PINK LITTLE FLOWERS IT LOOKS VERY BRIGHT DURING PLAYTIMES A LOT OF GIRLS PLAY HOPSCOTCH AND IT IS QUITE HARD. WE ALL LIKE TO PLAY TIGGY OFF GROUND . SOMETIMES WE PLAY COPS AND ROBBERS. SOMETIMES WE PLAY A TIG GAME CALLED STRINGY.
